title.rendered: Regional tax insights: Navigating the new tax compliance regulations in Asia

content.rendered:
In this informative presentation, our regional tax team will shed light on the often-overlooked transfer pricing requirements specific to China and Southeast Asian markets. You will gain valuable insights into essential tax updates and discover practical strategies tailored for companies operating in the region.

We look forward to connecting with you for another insightful Acclime webinar to support you positioning your business for success in Asia’s dynamic tax landscape.

Agenda

  • Regional tax updates
  • Tax considerations for “China+N” diversification strategy
  • Regional transfer pricing requirements and risk mitigation strategies
  • Case study
  • Q&A

Speakers

  • Helen NS Wong, Tax Advisory Manager, Acclime Hong Kong
  • Thomas Chan, Managing Director, Acclime Singapore
  • Mandy Liu, Associate Director, Accounting Services, Acclime China
